description: Returns the details of the host key that's specified by the HostKeyId and ServerId.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the server that contains the host key that you want described.

parameters.name: HostKeyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the host key that you want described.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the host key.

nested_items.name: HostKeyId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the host key.

nested_items.name: HostKeyFingerprint
nested_items.description: The public key fingerprint, which is a short sequence of bytes used to identify the longer public key.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The text description for this host key.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The encryption algorithm that is used for the host key. The Type parameter is specified by using one of the following values:

nested_items.name: DateImported
nested_items.description: The date on which the host key was added to the server.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for host keys.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.
